AI Description: kmergenie is a software tool used for estimating the best k-mer length for genome de novo assembly. It analyzes the histogram of k-mer occurrences in the input reads and recommends the optimal k-mer length to use for assembly.
Core Features: Estimates The Optimal K-Mer Length For De Novo Genome Assembly, Analyzes K-Mer Occurrence Histograms From Input Reads, Helps Avoid Excessive Memory Usage & Computational Time In Assembly Processes
General Tags: Genome Assembly, Bioinformatics, De Bruijn Graph
